article:
The pension system and its financing are some of the most important but also
some of the most difficult roles of a modern country. Every prosperous community
has a pension system at present; the citizens rely on its stability and the
system provides most of them with the main part of their income in old age. The
system's stability and financial sustainability are some of the key
preconditions for successful operation of the state and satisfaction of its
citizens. It is therefore very important to have a sound database for pension
system analyses and a reliable model for pension system simulations and
projections, for an example of a complex pension model see e.g. (Deloitte, 2011)
.
